text: Production of proinflammatory mediators by cpdm BMDC is impaired

Incubation with LPS or poly I : C resulted in secretion of <extra_id_0> IL6 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , IL12P70 , and <extra_id_0> GMCSF <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> from both WT and cpdm BMDC ; however , BMDC from cpdm mice produced significantly less of all three cytokines compared with WT BMDC ( Fig . 3A-C , E-F ) .

text: The amount of nitric oxide generated by mutant BMDC was also significantly reduced compared with WT cells ( Fig . 3D ) , indicating severely disrupted production of proinflammatory mediators from <extra_id_0> Sharpin <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - deficient BMDC .

In vivo complementation with a <extra_id_0> Sharpin <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> gene-containing BAC reversed the phenotype of the mutant mice [ 2 ] , and BMDC generated from these rescued mice secreted significantly more IL12P70 than BMDC from cpdm mice ( Fig . 3G ) , supporting a necessary role of <extra_id_0> SHARPIN <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> for the production of IL12P70 .

In addition , the transcript levels of the inflammatory cytokines <extra_id_0> Il6 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , <extra_id_0> Il12p40 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , <extra_id_0> Gmcsf <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , and <extra_id_0> Ifnb <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> were examined , and these were all significantly reduced in stimulated cpdm BMDC when compared with WT controls ( Fig . 4 ) .
